titleStmt.title: His Majesties letter to the Lords Spiritual and Temporal Commissioners of Shires and Burroughs assembled, or to be assembled at Edenborough
titleStmt.author: James II, King of England, 1633-1701.

notesStmt.note: "Given on board the St. Michel the 1st of March, and of our reign the 5th year."--P. 2.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
